title: CZI Science Cell Census API
text: CellCensus package provides API facilitate use CZI Science Cell Census. Cell Census versioned container single-cell data hosted CELLxGENE Discover. Status: Pre-release, rapid development. Expect API changes. information, see cell_census repo. Also see Python API.
